title: HOUR 1 - Jimmy Garoppolo Will Be Highly Coveted This Offseason
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Jimmy Garoppolo Will Be Highly Coveted This Offseason
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's Joy Taylor in for Colin. Joy sees Jimmy Garoppolo as the number one quarterback available for ready-to-win teams next season after he is inevitably released from the San Francisco 49ers in favor of first-round draft pick Trey Lance. Also, whether you love him or despise him, Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers cannot be stopped--as he is now the front-runner for the MVP. Plus, First Things First's Nick Wright joins The Herd to discuss all things topical in the late NFL season. Finally, Joy loathes the idea of cancelling College Football Playoff games and advancing teams by forfeit, arguing that the games must get played even in the face of surging Covid.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
